Package com.flipfit.business

Interface GymOwnerBusinessInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GymOwnerBusiness
public interface GymOwnerBusinessInterface
Author:
M J Avani Interface defining the business operations for a gym owner. This contract outlines the functionalities for managing a gym owner's profile, their associated gym centers, and time slots.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addGym(GymCenter gym)
    Adds a new gym center to the system, owned by the current gym owner.
    void
    addSlot(Slot slot)
    Adds a new time slot to a specific gym center.
    void
    editGym(GymCenter gym)
    Edits the details of an existing gym center.
    void
    editProfile(GymOwner gymOwnerNew)
    Updates the profile details for a gym owner.
    List<GymCenter>
    getGymDetail(String gymOwnerEmail)
    Retrieves the details of all gym centers associated with a specific gym owner.
    GymOwner
    getProfile(String email)
    Retrieves the profile information for a specific gym owner.

  • Method Details

    • getProfile

      GymOwner getProfile(String email)
      Retrieves the profile information for a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      A GymOwner object containing the profile details.

    • editProfile

      void editProfile(GymOwner gymOwnerNew)
      Updates the profile details for a gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerNew - The GymOwner object with the updated information.

    • addGym

      boolean addGym(GymCenter gym)
      Adds a new gym center to the system, owned by the current gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gym - The GymCenter object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the gym was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • editGym

      void editGym(GymCenter gym)
      Edits the details of an existing gym center.
      Parameters:
      gym - The GymCenter object containing the updated details.

    • addSlot

      void addSlot(Slot slot)
      Adds a new time slot to a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      slot - The Slot object to be added.

    • getGymDetail

      List<GymCenter> getGymDetail(String gymOwnerEmail)
      Retrieves the details of all gym centers associated with a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerEmail - The email of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      A list of GymCenter objects owned by the specified gym owner.
